import React from 'react' import s from './Friends.module.css' import axios from "axios" const Friends = (props) => { if (props.friendsData.length === 0) { axios.get("https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/users").then(response => { pro }) } debugger return
{props.friendsData.map( f =>
{f.followed ? : }
{f.name}
{f.status}
)}
} export default Friends
